2023 年 10 月 15 日星期日 15:57:29 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
我父亲阿列克谢·纳瓦尔尼的教训 |达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚Dasha Navalnaya is the daughter of Alexey Navalny, the politician and leader of the Russian opposition to Vladimir Putin. Sharing the story of her father's poisoning, persecution and current imprisonment, she details what it was like growing up under the watchful eye of government surveillance as her father led a decade-long investigation into the corruption of Putin's regime — and shows why paying attention to what happens in Russia matters to everyone, everywhere.我父亲阿列克谢·纳瓦尔尼的教训 |达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚Dasha Navalnaya is the daughter of Alexey Navalny, the politician and leader of the Russian opposition to Vladimir Putin. Sharing the story of her father's poisoning, persecution and current imprisonment, she details what it was like growing up under the watchful eye of government surveillance as her father led a decade-long investigation into the corruption of Putin's regime — and shows why paying attention to what happens in Russia matters to everyone, everywhere. https://www.ted.com/talks/dasha_navalnaya_lessons_from_my_father_alexey_navalny?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119023 119023 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 14:51:00 +0000高等教育不00:11:03泰德
“距任何海岸线数英里” |莎拉·凯莎拉·凯Sarah Kay shares "Miles from Any Shoreline," a poem about "wandering the streets of Bewilderville" and "picking up when the universe calls." “距任何海岸线数英里” |莎拉·凯Sarah Kay shares "Miles from Any Shoreline," a poem about "wandering the streets of Bewilderville" and "picking up when the universe calls." https://www.ted.com/talks/sarah_kay_miles_from_any_shoreline?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118554 118554 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 14:30:21 +0000高等教育不00:03:44泰德
我们实际上有机会阻止气候危机|阿斯梅雷特·阿瑟福·贝尔赫阿斯梅雷特·阿瑟福·贝尔赫How is the US going to reach net zero by 2050? That's the question Asmeret Asefaw Berhe, director of the Office of Science for the US Department of Energy, is urgently trying to answer. She shares the thinking behind what her team is calling "Energy Earthshots" — projects designed to accelerate innovation in the fight against climate change, from nature-based solutions in the soil to the creation of brand-new technologies — and calls for innovative, equitable policies backed by science.我们实际上有机会阻止气候危机|阿斯梅雷特·阿瑟福·贝尔赫How is the US going to reach net zero by 2050? That's the question Asmeret Asefaw Berhe, director of the Office of Science for the US Department of Energy, is urgently trying to answer. She shares the thinking behind what her team is calling "Energy Earthshots" — projects designed to accelerate innovation in the fight against climate change, from nature-based solutions in the soil to the creation of brand-new technologies — and calls for innovative, equitable policies backed by science. https://www.ted.com/talks/asmeret_asefaw_berhe_we_actually_have_a_shot_at_stopping_the_climate_crisis?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118669 118669 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 14:57:53 +0000高等教育不00:06:49泰德
我们需要哪些技术来对抗工作场所的年龄歧视皮亚查特·菲罗姆斯瓦德皮亚查特·菲罗姆斯瓦德From exoskeletons and robotic arms to the mass adoption of remote work, economist Piyachart Phiromswad explores what seniors need to overcome the physical, mental and societal barriers to employment, a necessary shift in our rapidly aging world. 以色列-哈马斯战争——及其对世界的意义 |伊恩·布雷默伊恩·布雷默The Hamas attacks on Israel in October 2023 stunned the world. In this timely conversation, political scientist Ian Bremmer explains the historical context of the conflict, how Israel might respond and what it means for Jews, Palestinians and the world at large. Listen in for analysis of the unprecedented events, how the US may factor into the global response and how to find reliable information amid the breathless media coverage and the fog of war. (This interview, hosted by TED's head of curation Helen Walters, was recorded on October 9, 2023.)以色列-哈马斯战争——及其对世界的意义 |伊恩·布雷默The Hamas attacks on Israel in October 2023 stunned the world. In this timely conversation, political scientist Ian Bremmer explains the historical context of the conflict, how Israel might respond and what it means for Jews, Palestinians and the world at large. Listen in for analysis of the unprecedented events, how the US may factor into the global response and how to find reliable information amid the breathless media coverage and the fog of war. (This interview, hosted by TED's head of curation Helen Walters, was recorded on October 9, 2023.) https://www.ted.com/talks/ian_bremmer_the_israel_hamas_war_and_what_it_means_for_the_world?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118894 118894 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 17:10:52 +0000高等教育不00:47:54泰德
智慧生活的3个实践|克里斯塔·蒂皮特克里斯塔·蒂皮特Journalist and podcast host Krista Tippett has spent a career interviewing some of the world's most brilliant people. All these conversations have left her with wisdom on the art of living and what it means to be human right now. Listen along as she offers three practices to help you make sense of the world around you and bring your fullest, most joyful self to it.智慧生活的3个实践|克里斯塔·蒂皮特Journalist and podcast host Krista Tippett has spent a career interviewing some of the world's most brilliant people. 工作发生了变化。怎么还没有简历？ |尼科斯·马库尼科斯·马库Resumes are a mainstay of the job application process — despite little evidence that they actually help job-seekers or employers get what they want. So why are we still so preoccupied with them? HR leader Nicos Marcou dives into the absurdity of these one-page documents (or can they be two pages?) and offers an update on how companies should think about hiring qualified candidates.工作发生了变化。怎么还没有简历？ |尼科斯·马库Resumes are a mainstay of the job application process — despite little evidence that they actually help job-seekers or employers get what they want. 如何修复时尚并保护地球|艾米·鲍尼艾米·鲍尼From the field to your closet, your clothes go on a long journey before they enter your life. Designer Amy Powney explores the fashion industry's brutal impact on the environment and human health, modeling what ethical, planet-friendly clothing can look like — and inviting us all to think beyond the label.如何修复时尚并保护地球|艾米·鲍尼From the field to your closet, your clothes go on a long journey before they enter your life. 企业如何推动解决社会问题|卡洛斯·罗德里格斯·帕斯托尔卡洛斯·罗德里格斯·帕斯托尔Driven by the belief that businesses can — and should — invest in the communities around them, Intercorp founder and philanthropist Carlos Rodríguez-Pastor has built schools, pharmacies and a literal bridge to better serve Peru's growing middle class. In conversation with TED business curator Corey Hajim, he explores the immense possibility behind private-public partnerships — and his conviction that any individual can step up to create change.企业如何推动解决社会问题|卡洛斯·罗德里格斯·帕斯托尔Driven by the belief that businesses can — and should — invest in the communities around them, Intercorp founder and philanthropist Carlos Rodríguez-Pastor has built schools, pharmacies and a literal bridge to better serve Peru's growing middle class. 隐形百科全书——失落故事之家|塔瓦雷斯·斯特拉坎塔瓦雷斯·斯特拉坎Conceptual artist Tavares Strachan creates the kinds of projects that make you stop in your tracks, like a 4.5-ton block of Arctic ice he brought back to his birthplace in the Bahamas or a gold, Egyptian-inspired sculpture he launched into orbit around the Earth. Now he presents his latest creation, the Encyclopedia of Invisibility: a 3,000-page tome filled with more than 17,000 entries on people, places and events often left out of the history books — and encourages us all to unearth hidden stories before they disappear to the passage of time.隐形百科全书——失落故事之家|塔瓦雷斯·斯特拉坎Conceptual artist Tavares Strachan creates the kinds of projects that make you stop in your tracks, like a 4.5-ton block of Arctic ice he brought back to his birthplace in the Bahamas or a gold, Egyptian-inspired sculpture he launched into orbit around the Earth. Now he presents his latest creation, the Encyclopedia of Invisibility: a 3,000-page tome filled with more than 17,000 entries on people, places and events often left out of the history books — and encourages us all to unearth hidden stories before they disappear to the passage of time. https://www.ted.com/talks/tavares_strachan_the_encyclopedia_of_invisibility_a_home_for_lost_stories?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:117865 117865 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 14:45:59 +0000高等教育不00:10:16泰德
